title: Ace the no-makeup look for your pre-wedding festivities
text: If you’re someone who doesn’t put makeup at all usually, will not feel the need for any during the wedding festivities too. But when you’re in the spotlight… with the bright lights focussing on you, putting no makeup whatsoever is not a choice as your face will look washed out. You need to put on some makeup that will highlight your best features, and if there is anything you want to hide, that’s possible too! Here’s some beauty inspo on how to ace the no-makeup look for your pre-wedding festivities.
description: Even if you aren’t into makeup, you need to put up some for your wedding celebrations. Take some beauty inspo on acing the no-makeup look
